Reviews.Title: Dissapointed with the seller
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop advertised as brand new.  It was about the same price as what the Dell website offered, but I went with Amazon and this seller because they could ship faster and cheaper with my Prime account.I had a warranty issue so I called Dell customer service.  I had my service tag number, receipt, everything, but Dell told me the computer is registered to another owner.  I went round and around with Dell but they told me point blank that if I can't provide the name and address of the original owner they will not honor the warranty.  I asked Amazon about it and Amazon said I've got to take it up with the seller.To make a long story short, a friend helped me out and the computer works now.  If you want to buy a laptop at premium price and get no warranty and a smack down from the manufacturer, the shipper, and the seller, then buy from these guys.

Reviews.Title: ratings
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: This product met my expectations. The webcam works perfectly well,good memory,keyboard comfortable and the ports,such as usb and thumb drive are combatible with cables.

Reviews.Title: A great buy
Reviews.Author: Yanina M.
Reviews.Content: The product is better than expected. The screen is large and excellent definition. The laptop is very lightweight, making it easy to transport. It's very efficient. A great buy.
